title: Afghan Refugees Suspend Protests at U.A.E. Camp After Talks With U.S.
sub_head: Afghans evacuated last summer have complained of prison-like conditions inside the Abu Dhabi transit facility
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”Afghan refugees protesting conditions at a transit facility in the United Arab Emirates agreed to suspend protests after several days of talks with local U.S. and Gulf officials, the refugees said on Tuesday.
Protests erupted last week among thousands of Afghans over what the refugees described as prison-like conditions at the Abu Dhabi facility where they have been held since their evacuation from Afghanistan this summer.
